name: Historic Bozeman Poster
description:
Our town's roots go way back :: This hand screen printed poster features images of Bozeman's  historical buildings with a neoclassical female figure as the center piece :: Signed by local Bozeman artist Wilson Raska

• Center image colored in either red or blue

• Printed on 80 lb. white French Dur-O-Tone Newsprint paper

• Size: 18" x 24"

• Screen printed right here in Bozeman, Montana by A Thousand Arms
